title: Is telling a lie for our own benefit good? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well,lies are some of the most handy tools for survival. as you grow older,you realize lying is more of a tool and less of a crime or so. Now,as for the benefits of lying, When you lie,you can save hell lot of time that you would else waste on explaining.Lying can avoid clashes,don’t ever underestimate this feature of lying.When you lie,you become creative;as truth is simple and can be told anytime;lying requires creativity and imagination.Generally,lies are more interesting than truths :pSo,you can safely conclude that lying is for our own benefit.however,i’d like to emphasize that never,ever ,ever lie to yourself. Also,always keep a few friends or people around you with whom you speak plain truth. Cause,lying is for all,while truth is for the few.
It maybe good, but you have to make sure that lie doesn't affect someone else in the slightest possible manner, if it doesn't then you're good to go. But lying isn't good so try to avoid it. :)
